questions.question: The teeth of an animal are shown in the image.  i. Which type of teeth does the animal have in the front? (1 Mark) ii. What is the use of such types of teeth in the animal? (2 Marks)

questions.question: Priya uses room light during the day, even though the room is bright enough. She is wasting energy. i. How can she conserve energy? (1 Mark) ii. Why is it important to conserve energy?  (2 Marks)

parts.answer: She can conserve energy, that is, electricity, by switching off the room light when not required.
Non-renewable sources of energy are easily exhausted and limited on the Earth. So, it is very important to conserve energy, so that the non-renewable sources of energy do not get exhausted.
